center
customer profiles is enabled directly in
the AWS console like any other bws

profile section of your Amazon connect
instance and choose enable customer
profiles add the customer profiles
enable page choose create new domain and
enter a friendly name that's meaningful
to you such as your organization name

card

Amazon connect creates a customer
